Use a DIYious Kit: This kit contains dental floss, mouthwash, and toothpaste. You can use the floss to remove any food particles and plaque from between your teeth, and the mouthwash and toothpaste to clean your teeth and freshen your breath.
Brush with Baking Soda: Mix some baking soda with water to create a paste, and use it to brush your teeth. Baking soda is a gentle abrasive that can help remove stains and freshen your teeth.

Use a Natural Toothpaste: Instead of using commercial toothpaste, try using natural ingredients like baking soda, honey, or coconut oil to clean your teeth. These ingredients are gentle and effective at removing plaque and freshening your breath.
Use a Waterpik: A Waterpik is a device that uses high-pressure water to clean your teeth. It can be an effective alternative to brushing and flossing, especially if you have sensitive teeth or gums.

Use a DIY Toothbrush: You can make your own toothbrush using a toothbrush head and a handle. Use a natural bristle like bamboo or straw, and dip the head in toothpaste or baking soda and water to clean your teeth.
